festival.introText: Get ready for the HRH Mothership of Hard Rock Hell The Holy Grail of Rock at Camp HRH, Great Yarmouth in 2023!
festival.descriptionText: Get more information about Hard Rock Hell 2023 including festival tickets, news, reviews and lineups.
festival.location: Vauxhall Holiday Park in Great Yarmouth

artists.name: Phil Campbell and the Bastard Sons

faqs.question: When is Hard Rock Hell 2023?
faqs.answer: Hard Rock Hell takes place from Thursday 2nd November - Sunday 5th November 2023.

faqs.question: How do I get to Hard Rock Hell?
faqs.answer:
Hard Rock Hell is located at Vauxhall Holiday Park

Acle New Road

Great Yarmouth

NR30 1TB

 

For more information, see https://hardrockhell.com/information/directions/

faqs.question: Does Hard Rock Hell  have onsite camping?
faqs.answer:
No, Hard Rock Hell is a non-camping festival so camping equipment is not needed. 

 

There is limited accommodation on site, please visit https://hardrockhell.com/information/accommodation/ for more information.

faqs.question: Where is Hard Rock Hell?
faqs.answer:
Hard Rock Hell is located at Vauxhall Holiday Park

Acle New Road

Great Yarmouth

NR30 1TB

faqs.question: Does Hard Rock Hell have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes you must be 18 or over to attend Hard Rock Hell. You will need photo ID.

faqs.question: Will there be alcohol at the event?
faqs.answer: Alcohol will be served the whole time the arenas are open.
